channel.title: jonathannen.com
channel.description: Thoughts from Jon Williams. Say Hi at twitter.com/jonathannen

item.title: ["Do you feel comfortable", "being flown by an ai pilot?"]
item.description: Self-Flying. Will AI and Machine Learning replace your Captain and First Officer?
item.author: jon@jonthannen.com (Jon Williams)

item.title: ["What will", "self-driving cars do to cities?"]
item.description: Once we have electric and self-driving cars, what happens to all the land blighted and consumed by roads?
item.author: jon@jonthannen.com (Jon Williams)

item.title: ["Have you", "licensed your ruby gems?"]
item.description: We're used to Ruby gems being permissive licenses, but that's not always the case. Using gemfresh you can see what licences are in your Gemfile.
item.author: jon@jonthannen.com (Jon Williams)

item.title: ["Are your", "ruby gems fresh?"]
item.description: Gemfresh is a quick and easy tool to see which Ruby gems in your Gemfile are ready for an update.
item.author: jon@jonthannen.com (Jon Williams)
